description: vol. 3 (bāb al-nadhr fī al-ḥajj through kitāb al-waqālah). ff. 413. 268 x 180; 200 x 125 mm. 31 lin. 15th/16th cen. - on the margins (e.g. 106b, 181a) several certificates of reading by Ibrāhīm [ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ] al-Karakī, 910 H. Commentary on the Hidāyah: Brockelmann, GAL, I, 467 (commentary 9); S I, 645 (10). Incip.: ... الحمد لله رب العالمىن على ما الهم وعلم من العلم ... وبعد فهذا تعلىق على کتاب الهداىة
author: Ibn al-Humām, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Wāḥid, 1388-1456 or 1457
title: Fatḥ al-qadīr lil-ʻājiz al-faqīr.
creator: Ibn al-Humām, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Wāḥid, 1388-1456 or 1457
subject: Marghīnānī, ʻAlī ibn Abī Bakr, -1196 or 1197—Hidāyah
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
